infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a kitchen. The room is well lit.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator nearby.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The refrigerator is empty![end if] You can see a counter. The counter is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_1]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a stove. [if there is something on the s_2]On the stove you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stove.[end if] You see a kitchen island. [if there is something on the s_3]On the kitchen island you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The kitchen island appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You make a grand eccentric entrance into a bedroom.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking chest drawer right there by you.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest drawer contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest drawer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can see an antique trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The antique trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The antique trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a king-size bed. [if there is something on the s_0]On the king-size bed you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east.

infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a backyard.

 You see a set of chairs. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the set of chairs. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a bbq. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the bbq. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a patio table. [if there is something on the s_9]On the patio table you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]The patio table appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading west. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: living room
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the living room.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a couch. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the couch.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]However, the couch, like an empty couch, has nothing on it.[end if] You see a low table. The low table is standard.[if there is something on the s_6] On the low table you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] However, the low table, like an empty low table, has nothing on it.[end if] You scan the room for a tv, and you find a tv. The tv is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_7] On the tv you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a normal kind of place. That is to say, you're in a bathroom. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a toilet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toilet contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The toilet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bath right there by you.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The bath contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The bath is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a sink. The sink is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the sink you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] However, the sink, like an empty sink, has nothing on it. This always happens![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: garden
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a garden. A normal one.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

walkthrough: take old key from antique trunk
unlock wooden door with old key

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, look and see that the antique trunk inside the bedroom is opened. Then, recover the old key from the antique trunk. Then, make absolutely sure that the wooden door inside the bedroom is unlocked. After unlocking the wooden door, open the wooden door in the bedroom. Then, try to head east. After that, try to travel south. Once you get through with that, take the milk from the couch within the living room. Having taken the milk, attempt to travel north. That done, rest the milk on the stove inside the kitchen. And if you do that, you're the winner!
